sent.orig: My sentiments at heart were insular and medieval.
sent.trans: 我内心的感情是保守的，倾向于中世纪的。

sent.orig: Build a medieval city, which you will see thrive and grow before your eyes.
sent.trans: 建立一个中世纪的城市，你会看到蓬勃发展和成长摆在你的眼前。

sent.orig: The medieval town was fortified with a high wall and a deep moat.
sent.trans: 这座中世纪的城市用高墙深沟来加强防御。

sent.orig: Rogge grew up in the medieval Flemish harbor city of Ghent, where he learned to sail.
sent.trans: 罗格在充满中世纪风情的佛兰芒港口城市根特长大成人，在这里他学会了航海。

sent.orig: He went upstairs to put on his slippersDhis elegant slippers of seal-brown, shaped like medieval shoes.
sent.trans: 他上楼去换了拖鞋――一双黄褐色、中世纪式样的漂亮的拖鞋。
